turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. I want to order a I want to order a drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you said the caffe latte, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, and you wanted that in a grande?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want to add any milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, one moment while i place your order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a grande caffe latte to be picked up at the starbucks in westlake, daly city, ca, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your order will be ready for pickup in 5 minutres.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
